attributes.review: This app is lying and will steal your email address and kick you off the app this is horrible and I would not like to see it happen to other people for people have rights and need their email for jobs, school, and KIDS yes, KIDS what would we be without kids? I don’t know you tell me? Oh you can’t! EXACTLY! At the end of the day this app should be gone it’s horrible and never works! Like we need kids for our future generations and without kids and women what would we be? Huh? HUH? you’d be living on the roads if it weren’t for kids. GENERATIONS MATTER. Now take this app off of the App Store right now.
attributes.title: TAKE THIS OFF ALL PLATFORMS

attributes.review: Now i usually do not leave reviews. In fact i have NEVER reviewed an app. But alas i downloaded this app to keep track on this idiotic man child running our country and was so disappointed, disgusted, appalled, infuriated on this app. IT IS THE WORST APP I HAVE EVER EVER EVER USED. It has made my phone glitch stole my information take away my rights. My body my choice. I cannot think of a worse app to download please whatever you do save yourself from the never ending notifications and fake news alerts you will receive. Please i beg you do not give this fat man any of your information or he will haunt you for eternity.
attributes.title: Worst app EVER

attributes.review:
Oh, to see without my eyes
The first time that you kissed me
Boundless by the time I cried
I built your walls around me
White noise, what an awful sound
Fumbling by Rogue River
Feel my feet above the ground
Hand of God, deliver me
Oh, oh woe-oh-woah is me
The first time that you touched me
Oh, will wonders ever cease?
Blessed be the mystery of love
Lord, I no longer believe
Drowned in living waters
Cursed by the love that I received
From my brother's daughter
Like Hephaestion, who died
Alexander's lover
Now my riverbed has dried
Shall I find no other?
Oh, oh woe-oh-woah is me
I'm running like a plover
Now I'm prone to misery
The birthmark on your shoulder reminds me
How much sorrow can I take?
Blackbird on my shoulder
And what difference does it make
When this love is over?
Shall I sleep within your bed
River of unhappiness
Hold your hands upon my head
'Til I breathe my last breath
Oh, oh woe-oh-woah is me
The last time that you touched me
Oh, will wonders ever cease?
Blessed be the mystery of love
attributes.title: Oh 👁👄👁 to see without my eyes 🤚🏼👄🤚🏼

attributes.title: Official Trump 2020

attributes.review: “The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal *bodeboop*. A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. *ding* Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!… Start. *ding*﻿”
attributes.title: No and no and no

attributes.review: Should have read the description all the way because it is using my location constantly! Since it is running in the background my phone is dying faster. Why do they need to track me while I’m on the app? Most importantly, why do they need to track me when I’m OFF the app?! Worst app ever. My small hands cause me to have issues using the app. When you look at me you would probably think “Yeah she would have big hands”, but if you look at my hands they are actually small. In conclusion this app tested positively for negative.
attributes.title: My phone is slowly dying at a fast pace

attributes.review: I was chillan watching some Netflix’s and my pet money got hungry so I went to walmart to get some food when it proceeded to slam me to the ground slap me in the face and it watched me bleed and began to pick me back up and slam me to the floor again I’m so flabbergasted by the fact that this could happen this app is so irresponsible how could you !! and to think I actually had faith. I was trying to crawl outta there and they proceeded to slam a cart on my head !! all I was trying to do was buy groceries 🥺🥺 well here’s an update: I’m now in the hospital with minor concussions this app deserves nothing but a 1 star and horrible reviews!! 😡😡
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER !! 😡

attributes.review: this is a horrible app. it crashed my phone when i downloaded it and when i opened the app for the first time it almost downloaded malware onto my device. the first thing i saw on the app was text that said i was fat, ugly, and stinky. it then told me to go back to my country, but i’m american! i tried to overlook that and give the app a second chance and then i saw a nude image of donald trump. that was the last straw. ever since i deleted the app i’ve felt prettier, healthier, and happier. if i could describe it in one word, i would choose ugly. do not download this app. you will regret it.
attributes.title: Do NOT Download This App 😡🚩😱🦪
